thread.title: Project Prelude Rune Is the Next RPG from Square Enix | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Project Prelude Rune Is the Next RPG from Square Enix | The Daily Dot

author: Aj Moser
title: Project Prelude Rune Is the Next RPG from Square Enix | The Daily Dot
text:
Square Enix See some gorgeous concept art right now. 
Square Enix, the iconic Japanese video game company famous for the Final Fantasy franchise, has announced a mysterious new project titled Project Prelude Rune. 
The game comes from the mind of Hideo Baba, former producer of the Tales Of series, and Japanese developer Studio Istolia. Very few details were released on when we can expect the game or what platforms it will be available on, but some concept art and a description were unveiled. Square Enix Studio Istolia, whose name comes from the Greek word for "story" had the following to say about its ambitions for the game: The project aims to build a new RPG with a new fantasy: unfolding across a vast land teeming with life. Nurtured by the earth, the many peoples of this land dare to dream, fighting for what is justâ€”and this is their tale . This title joins the mysterious Project Octopath Traveler planned for Nintendo Switch . A brief tease for that game was unveiled during Nintendo's recent presentation.
